module.name: projects
module.description: Order projects in categories. A project has a set of images.

events.event: Triggered when a project is added.
Triggered when a project is deleted.
Triggered when a project is edited.
Triggered when a category is added.
Triggered when a category is deleted.
Triggered when a category is edited.
Triggered when an image is added.
Triggered when an image is deleted.
Triggered when an image is edited.
